name: Egghead 3: Egghead in Space
description: Flip-screen platform arcade adventure.  Aliens have stolen Egghead's computer games and he has to recover the disc from their spaceship, collecting various objects to open up more of the game map along the way.  Egghead needs to leap around the platforms in a fashion similar to Monty Mole, Manic Miner or Jet Set Willy.  In addition, Egghead can make use of two teleporters on board the vessel.  Contact with the patrolling aliens or falling too far will cause the loss of a life.
